text.content:
graph TD
  A[Fetch instruction from memory] --> B[Decode instruction]
	B --> C[Evaluate address]
	C --> D[Fetch operands]
	D --> E[Execute operations]
	E --> F[Store result]
	F --> A

rich_text.plain_text:
graph TD
  A[Fetch instruction from memory] --> B[Decode instruction]
	B --> C[Evaluate address]
	C --> D[Fetch operands]
	D --> E[Execute operations]
	E --> F[Store result]
	F --> A
